mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_id AS "order.id", a.product_number AS "productNumber", a.name AS "name", a.pic_img AS "picImg", a.product_spec_number AS "productSpecNumber", a.product_spec_name AS "productSpecName", a.product_price AS "productPrice", a.product_score AS "productScore", a.product_amount AS "productAmount", a.buy_number AS "buyNumber", a.design_by AS "designBy.id", a.design_price AS "designPrice", a.design_amount AS "designAmount", a.price AS "price", a.score AS "score", a.comment_status AS "commentStatus", c.user_name AS "designBy.userName"
